name: Whispers In The Pines
description:
Whispers In The Pines was made in three days! It was created in a youtube video that you can watch here: Watch me making it

  I challenged myself to make a horror game without coding! This is the download page to it! It is not much but I think you might enjoy it for a short gaming experience.

  This game has about 10~ minutes of a story. The game itself was more of a challenge to see what I could do in a week's worth of time. I hope you guys enjoy the little game that this is!

This game is not finished. This game was made in three days! It could have bugs, issues, and the game length is pretty short. Please have fun with it! Subscribe?

Please subscribe to my channel if you find yourself enjoying this game!

YouTube Website
